description: React functional component 'TopNav' implementing a top navigation bar with theme toggle, user profile, settings, and sign-out functionalities, utilizing hooks, navigation, and logging.

methods.name: TopNav({ title = "Home", onMenu })
methods.description: React component rendering top navigation with theme toggle, user actions, and navigation handlers.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggle between light and dark themes and log the change.

methods.name: onGoProfile
methods.description: Navigate to user profile page if authenticated and not disabled by feature flag; log actions.

methods.name: onGoSettings
methods.description: Navigate to settings page if authenticated and not disabled by feature flag; log actions.

methods.name: onSignOut
methods.description: Sign out the user, navigate to home, handle errors, and log actions.
